Introduction
This topic contains information on requests for competency determinations from the IC, including
eligibility for Veterans Affairs Life Insurance (VALife)
applying for VALife
requests the IC sends to the regional office (RO) of jurisdiction (ROJ)
contents of requests the IC sends to the ROJ
processing insurance cases involving
coma incident to the terminal state
, and
suicide
processing IC requests for competency determinations
hearing requests
, and
preparing the rating decision for insurance purposes
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section G - Competency Determinations for the Insurance Center (IC)
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section G
